Installation
============

Automatic installation
______________________

To install AGOX clone the repository from and install using pip 

.. code-block:: console

   (user) $ pip install .

Manual installation
___________________

AGOX relies on a number of Python packages, usage requires the following packages to be 
installed 
    * ase
    * numpy 
    * matplotlib
    * sklearn
    * mpi4py
    * dscribe
    * Cython==0.29.23
    * cymem==2.0.5
